name: The Beacon
description: The Beacon is a fantasy action roguelite RPG. Venture into dungeons, defeat evils, expand the Beacon's protective light & keep humanity safe!

name: Bitmates
description: Explore, gather resources, and interact with other players in the world of Bitmates. An MMO where monkeys rule the lands.

name: Brave
description: Brave is on a mission to protect your privacy online. We make a suite of internet privacy tools—including our browser and search engine—that shield you from the ads, trackers, and other creepy stuff trying to follow you across the web.

name: Bridgeworld
description: Bridgeworld is the center of the Treasure multiverse.

name: Chainlink CCIP
description: Chainlink CCIP is a secure interoperability protocol for enabling token transfers across blockchains, sending cross-chain messages, building cross-chain applications.

name: Clusters
description: All the chains, all your wallets, one universal name.

name: Coinbase Wallet
description: The easiest and most secure crypto wallet and dapp browser. Your gateway to the decentralized web.

name: Delegate
description: Keep your vaulted NFTs and ERC20s safe by linking wallets together. Claim airdrops, prove token ownership, and more from your hot wallet.

name: EigenDA
description: EigenDA is a hyper scalable data availability store built for Ethereum rollups. Live on mainnet, with 15MB/s of write throughput.

name: EigenLayer
description: EigenLayer is a protocol built on Ethereum that introduces restaking, a new primitive in cryptoeconomic security. It allows users to stake assets such as Native ETH, Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), EIGEN token or any ERC20 token into EigenLayer smart contracts.

name: Goldsky
description: Goldsky is the go-to data indexer for web3 builders, offering high-performance subgraph hosting and realtime data replication pipelines.

name: Hyperlane
description: Hyperlane is the open interoperability framework to connect anywhere onchain.

name: Ledger
description: Buy, sell, swap, lend, stake and manage more than 6000+ cryptos with your Ledger hardware wallet and the Ledger Live companion app. Achieve financial freedom in a secure, stress-free environment.

name: Magicswap
description: Magicswap is Treasure's decentralized trading protocol with universal token compatibility.

name: MetaMask
description: The world's leading Ethereum and EVM wallet.

name: Palmera
description: Palmera is an aggregation layer designed for on-chain organizations to manage multiple Safe multisig across multiple chains.

name: Rabby
description: The game-changing wallet for Ethereum and all EVM chains.

name: Rainbow Wallet
description: Rainbow is a fun, simple, and secure way to web3, NFTs, and Ethereum.

name: Safe
description: Safe is the most trusted multi-sig wallet platform to manage digital assets on Ethereum.

name: SimpleHash
description: SimpleHash provides developers with real-time fungible and NFT data through APIs and developer tools.

name: Smolbound
description: The world’s first ever-growing life sim RPG with a Smol twist.

name: Synergy Land
description: Synergy Land is an Action RPG game that integrates MOBA mechanics.

name: thirdweb
description: thirdweb is a full stack, open-source web3 development platform.

name: Trust Wallet
description: Trust Wallet is a multi-chain, self-custody wallet with 60M+ users. Supporting 70+ chains & 8M+ digital assets; you can manage crypto & NFTs, explore DeFi and connect to dApps safely & securely.

name: Variance
description: Variance is an action roguelite + metroidvanian powered by a digital economy. Explorer new levels, master special attacks and discover her legacy.

name: WalletConnect
description: WalletConnect is the communications protocol connecting web3 through a messaging layer and SDKs that enable authentication, push notifications, and wallet messaging.

name: Zeeverse
description: Zeeverse is a monster-tamer MMORPG set in an indigenous fantasy world.

name: Zerion
description: Manage your DeFi and NFT portfolios, trade across 10+ networks and connect to any decentralized application with one wallet.
